title: Solidarity in euro zone should not lead to debt union -...
content: 18:11 GMT - Charleston Daily Mail By Reuters Published: 13:09 EDT, 2 June 2018 | Updated: 13:09 EDT, 2 June 2018 BERLIN, June 2 (Reuters) - German Chancellor Angela Merkel appeared on Saturday to rule out debt relief for Italy, saying in a newspaper interview that the principle of solidarity among members of the euro zone should not turn the single currency bloc into a debt-sharing union. "I will approach the …
